description: Naked and tape-gagged on a bed, John struggles to untie his ankles and wrists attached by rope to a broomstick that serves as a leg separator. He makes swift progress in getting free of the broomstick, after which it’s just a matter of time before he can undo all the rope that has been binding him. // Keith, plug-gagged and naked except for socks and briefs which have been pulled down a little below his ass, is hogtied on a bed. He manages to undo some knots but no important ones, and after groaning and thrashing around on the bed a little hysterically, he gives up. // Ricardo, plug-gagged and in briefs, dark socks and sneakers, is also hogtied, on a different bed. He contorts his body in every direction, which succeeds in getting his briefs pushed down. Finally he does manage to bring a hand around in front and finally reaches and loosens the knot on his belly. From there, he succeeds in untying his hands, then his feet. He takes off the gag // Brent is naked, gagged with black tape and bucked on a bed, a broomstick between his elbows and knees. In his careful way, he calmly and assiduously works to get free, and does manage to loosen a few ropes and untie a knot or two, but not the necessary ones, and eventually he lies back, exhausted.
title: Now Get Loose: Bedbound, with Variations on a Broomstick
